## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
plot <- 
siafi_results %>% 
  mutate(Bestand = "SIAFI") %>% 
  bind_rows(bas_results %>% mutate(Bestand = "BAS")) %>% 
  select(Bestand, Baumart, Periode, GWertL, Wert.a.) %>% 
  pivot_longer(c(GWertL, Wert.a.)) %>% 
  filter(Baumart == "Alle Arten") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Periode, value, color = Bestand)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~name,
             scales = "free")

ggsave("plot.png",
       units = "mm",
       width = 297,
       height = 210
       )
```

```{r}
bas_results |> 
  mutate(Bestand = "bas") |> 
  select(c(Bestand, Periode, Baumart, GWertL)) |> 
  ggplot(aes(Periode, GWertL, color = Baumart)) +
  geom_line()


```
